featured.text: MAMMA MIA! has become a 22 entertainment phenomenon.
Scientists have been discussing crown shyness since the 1920s, proposing 12 explanations for the phenomenon.
The phenomenon of stress is the constant interaction between mind and body.
15 decades of investigation, there is no consensus on exactly what causes the beautiful and mysterious phenomenon of crown shyness.

other.text: Generally, they appear on both cheeks; a single dimple on one cheek is a relatively 31 phenomenon.
This beautiful phenomenon is called crown shyness.
This interesting phenomenon becomes a subject explored by many scientists.

definition.zh_def: 現象；可觀察到的事件或情況
definition.en_def: An observable event or situation, especially one that is unusual or difficult to explain.
definition.example: The northern lights are a natural phenomenon that attracts many tourists.
